jsx.ui.layout
Class BarLayout

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.ui.Container.Layout
              jsx.ui.layout.AbsoluteLayout
                  jsx.ui.layout.FlowLayout
                      jsx.ui.layout.BarLayout

public class BarLayout
extends FlowLayout

Lays out children of a container in a horizontal or vertical bar.

Note, A BarLayout is a FlowLayout although a FlowLayout is composed of BarLayout layouts.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

ALIGN

public static final Id<java.lang.Boolean> ALIGN

A global identifier for a configurable property of a BarLayout object.

The identified configurable property of a BarLayout object refers to a boolean value specifying whether the layout manager align the children of the container for which it is doing layout.

Since:
1.0

FIT

public static final Id<java.lang.Boolean> FIT

A global identifier for a configurable property of a BarLayout object.

The identified configurable property of a BarLayout object refers to a boolean value specifying whether the layout manager fit the last children of the container for which it is doing layout.

Since:
1.0
Constructor Detail

BarLayout

public BarLayout()

The default constructor that constructs a layout manager of this type.

This constructor invokes the default constructor of the superclass.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
BarLayout(ObjectLike)

BarLayout

public BarLayout(ObjectLike ini)

A typical constructor that constructs a layout manager of this type and forces constructors of subclasses to pass initializing data.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of the superclass passing the specified initializing object as the argument.

Parameters:
ini - The initializing object.
Since:
1.0
See Also:

Layouts a container.

This method layouts children of a container in a horizontal or vertical bar.

onResize

protected void onResize(Container c)

Layouts a container when notified it has been resized.

This method layouts children of a container in a horizontal or vertical bar.

Overrides:
onResize in class AbsoluteLayout
Parameters:

Since:
